FIRSTNAME_STRING: Please enter the first name as text!
LASTNAME_STRING: Please enter the last name as text!
PASSWORD_STRING: Password must consist of letters and numbers!
PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long!
PHONE_INVALID: Please enter the phone number in the correct format! (e.g.: +998901234567)
PHONE_REGEX: Phone number is invalid, please use the correct format!
REGISTERCODE_INT: Confirmation code must be a number!
REGISTERCODE_LENGTH: Confirmation code must be 6 digits long!
GENDER_STRING: Gender must be entered as text!
PASSPORT_STRING: Passport number must be entered as text!
SEATNUMBER_INT: Passenger seat number must be a number!
DATE_TRIP_NOT_FOUND: No trips available on this date!
BANKCARD_REGEX: Only UzCard or Humo cards are allowed!
BANKCARD_INVALID: Card number has an invalid format!
EXPIRYDATE_EMPTY: Please enter the card expiry date!
EXPIRYDATE_REGEX: Expiry date format is invalid! Correct format: MM/YY
CHECKUSER: A user with this phone number is already registered!
LOGIN_CHECUSER: No user found with this phone number!
USER_TOKEN_WRONG: Token does not belong to this user!
USER_DATA: User data is incomplete! Please fill in all required information!
INVALID_FILE: Please upload the image as a file!
FILE_SIZE: Image size must not exceed 5 MB!
